emerging_technologies.name: Quantum-Secure Blockchain
emerging_technologies.description: A blockchain system designed to withstand attacks from quantum computers by integrating post-quantum cryptography.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances data security and trust in digital transactions, critical for long-term digital infrastructure.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption depends on the advancement in quantum computing and the urgency to protect against quantum threats.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural Lace
emerging_technologies.description: A mesh of tiny electrodes that integrates with brain tissue to enhance cognitive functions or assist in neurological treatments.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Raises ethical concerns about privacy, autonomy, and enhancement equality. Potential for cognitive augmentation.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires overcoming significant technical challenges, regulatory approval, and public acceptance.

emerging_technologies.name: Smart City Digital Twin
emerging_technologies.description: Virtual models of physical cities that allow for real-time management, simulation, and optimization of urban environments.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Improves urban planning, emergency response, and resource management but might centralize control.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption driven by urban development needs, government policies, and IoT proliferation.

emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Drug Discovery
emerging_technologies.description: Use of AI to model drug interactions at a molecular level, accelerating the discovery and development of new pharmaceuticals.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces time and cost of drug development, potentially increasing access to medicine but also raising issues of data privacy.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Highly influenced by pharmaceutical industry investment and regulatory frameworks.

mainstream_technologies.name: 5G Advanced Networks
mainstream_technologies.description: Enhanced 5G networks with greater capacity, lower latency, and improved reliability for a fully connected society.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in urban areas, with rural and developing regions catching up.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Electric Vehicles
mainstream_technologies.description: Electric vehicles capable of self-driving with integrated AI for navigation and safety.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming standard in public transport and ride-sharing services, with private ownership growing.

epoch_themes.description: A focus on ensuring the integrity and security of digital interactions in an increasingly interconnected world.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Promotes trust in digital systems but also highlights vulnerabilities and the need for robust cybersecurity measures.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increasing cyber threats, regulatory focus on data protection, and global push for digital sovereignty.

epoch_themes.description: Urban areas are becoming smarter, more sustainable, and better integrated with technology to enhance livability and efficiency.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Improves quality of life, reduces environmental footprint, but requires significant investment and could lead to digital divide issues.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Urbanization, climate change mitigation, and the push for green infrastructure.
